name: Kylie'sKindness
0:
”Alexa, open kylie's kindness”
”Alexa, start kylie's kindness”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kylie's kindness
des:
Start and end your days with inspirational quotes about the power of loving kindness. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. Kylie Riordan is a Social Media Writer, Author on Kindness Compassion and Love, is trained in Clinical Hypnotherapy and Psychotherapy, and has Certificate Four in Education Support.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
